alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:42PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jefferson, northwestern Crook and northwestern Deschutes Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 541 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McKenzie Pass, or 24 miles northwest of Bend, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redmond, Madras, Sisters, Culver, Metolius, Terrebonne, Gateway, Grizzly, Camp Sherman and Black Butte Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades; Ochoco-John Day Highlands
